title: Large Social Survey Symposium 2024
text:
With the support of the UK Data Service, the 2024 Large Social Survey Annual Symposium will take place on the 3rd May in the Iris Murdoch Conference Suite at the University of Stirling.
Please reach out to us at mail.largesocialsurveys@gmail.com to submit an abstract to speak or attend as a delegate. We welcome submissions concerning large social survey data from all social scientists and on a range of topics.
 Register to attend today!

Large Social Surveys Research Group
The Large Social Surveys Research Group (LSS) brings together postgraduate and early careers social scientists to facilitate practical, methodological and epistemological discussions around using large-scale and/or complex social survey data.
This website hosts and documents our main activities and findings. Each month the research group meets up to discuss projects, findings, research, and proposals surrounding the work of large social surveys. We also put on larger events, including our annual to showcase research through presentations and feedback in a collaborative process.
